events: Graduated from Cornell University with a Bachelor of Fine Arts

lifePeriods.location: New York City, New York, USA
events: Began painting horses as a way to re-engage with figurative painting
First solo exhibition in 1975 in Galleria Gian Enzo Sperone, Rome

lifePeriods.location: New York City, New York, USA
events: Married to artist Bruce Nauman in 1989
Moved to Mexico with her husband
Received the National Endowment for the Arts Fellowship in 2009
